hero.title: Hi, I’m Egah
hero.subtitle: Robotics & Artificial Intelligence Student (8th Semester)/nAutonomous Systems • Computer Vision • Technical Leadership
hero.tagline: Building intelligent systems with real-world impact.

about.text: I am a Robotics and Artificial Intelligence student at Universitas Airlangga with strong interests in autonomous robots, computer vision, and artificial intelligence. My journey combines technical development, leadership experience, and real-world applications.

journey.title: Level Commander of the 3rd cohort of Robotics & AI Engineering
journey.short: Served as Level Commander for the 3rd cohort of Robotics and Artificial Intelligence Engineering, leading and supporting the academic and non-academic processes of more than 90 students.
journey.description: Served as Level Commander for the 3rd cohort of Robotics and Artificial Intelligence Engineering, leading and supporting the academic and non-academic processes of more than 90 students.

journey.title: Best Intern Staff – Ministry of Human Resource Development BEM FTMM 2023
journey.short: Awarded Best Intern at the Ministry of Human Resource Development BEM FTMM, demonstrating strong work ethic, initiative, and organizational contribution.
journey.description: Awarded Best Intern at the Ministry of Human Resource Development BEM FTMM, demonstrating strong work ethic, initiative, and organizational contribution.

journey.title: Treasurer Airlangga Robotics Community 2023
journey.short: Managed financial planning and accountability for the Airlangga University Robotics Community, supporting sustainable organizational operations.
journey.description: Managed financial planning and accountability for the Airlangga University Robotics Community, supporting sustainable organizational operations.

journey.title: Junior Programmer Airlangga Abu Robocon Team 2023
journey.short: Contributed as a Junior Programmer in the Abu Robocon Team, focusing on software development, logic implementation, and robotics system integration.
journey.description: Contributed as a Junior Programmer in the Abu Robocon Team, focusing on software development, logic implementation, and robotics system integration.

journey.title: Staf of Social & Environmental Ministry 2023
journey.short: Lead Organizer of a Student Blood Donation Program involving 50+ student donors, alongside community service activities at an inclusive children’s foundation and beach clean-up programs in Surabaya.
journey.description: Lead Organizer of a Student Blood Donation Program involving 50+ student donors, alongside community service activities at an inclusive children’s foundation and beach clean-up programs in Surabaya.

journey.title: Silver Medalist – PIMNAS 36
journey.short: Awarded a Silver Medal in the Poster Category at the 36th PIMNAS under the Futuristic Written Idea Scheme (2023). Presented an innovative concept of a Sustainable Marine Maintenance System based on Artificial Intelligence (AI) and the Internet of Things (IoT), integrating principles of physics and modern technology.
journey.description: Awarded a Silver Medal in the Poster Category at the 36th PIMNAS under the Futuristic Written Idea Scheme (2023). Presented an innovative concept of a Sustainable Marine Maintenance System based on Artificial Intelligence (AI) and the Internet of Things (IoT), integrating principles of physics and modern technology.

journey.title: Team Leader Airlangga Abu Robocon 2024
journey.short: Led the Airlangga University Abu Robocon Team at the 2024 Indonesian Abu Robocon Contest, successfully advancing the team to the national stage and qualifying for the playoff round for the first time in its history.
journey.description: Led the Airlangga University Abu Robocon Team at the 2024 Indonesian Abu Robocon Contest, successfully advancing the team to the national stage and qualifying for the playoff round for the first time in its history.

journey.title: Head of Airlangga Robotics Community 2024
journey.short: Led more than 80 members, 5 managerial divisions, and 7 competition teams, successfully elevating the Airlangga Robotics Community to the Top 6 university rankings.
journey.description: Led more than 80 members, 5 managerial divisions, and 7 competition teams, successfully elevating the Airlangga Robotics Community to the Top 6 university rankings.

journey.title: MBI Robotics Trainer 2024
journey.short: Provided hands-on robotics training, focusing on fundamental electronics, programming, and problem-solving skills
journey.description: Provided hands-on robotics training, focusing on fundamental electronics, programming, and problem-solving skills.

journey.title: Saim Robotics Trainer 2025
journey.short: Mentored students in applied robotics projects, emphasizing logical thinking, teamwork, and practical engineering implementation.
journey.description: Mentored students in applied robotics projects, emphasizing logical thinking, teamwork, and practical engineering implementation.

journey.title: Minister of Professional Development BEM UNAIR 2025
journey.short: Led professional development initiatives to enhance student skills, career readiness, and future-oriented competencies.
journey.description: Led professional development initiatives to enhance student skills, career readiness, and future-oriented competencies.

journey.title: Funded Community Empowerment Program – Ministry of Higher Education, Science, and Technology (2025)
journey.short: Initiated a community empowerment program focused on optimizing circular economy practices for dairy cattle farmers through technology-based waste processing innovations and social community empowerment in Bermi , Krucil . Played a crucial role as the core team responsible for handling and developing the technological aspects of the program.
journey.description: Initiated a community empowerment program focused on optimizing circular economy practices for dairy cattle farmers through technology-based waste processing innovations and social community empowerment in Bermi Village, Krucil District. Played a crucial role as the core team responsible for handling and developing the technological aspects of the program.

projects.title: Linear Regression Analysis of Rice Production in Indonesia 2023
projects.description: Linear regression analysis to predict rice production based on harvested area using BPS data

projects.title: Housing Vulnerability in Indonesia Using Socioeconomic Infrastructure Data and Logistic Regression
projects.description: Logistic regression analysis of housing vulnerability using socioeconomic and infrastructure indicators in Indonesia

projects.title: Mobile Robot Controller
projects.description: Embedded system and controller design for mobile robots

contact.text: Interested in collaboration, research discussion, or professional opportunities?
